Macros

#define MAX_ITERATIONS_RANDOMIZE_LOOP   1000
#define rnd_weight(rnd, value, dinf, range, weightnearzero)

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define MAX_ITERATIONS_RANDOMIZE_LOOP   1000
#define rnd_weight (   rnd,
  value,
  dinf,
  range,
  weightnearzero 
)
Value:
do { \
unsigned int it = 0; \
do { \
(value) = (rnd)->rand((range))+(dinf); \
it++; \
} while (it < MAX_ITERATIONS_RANDOMIZE_LOOP && \
fabs((value)) < (weightnearzero)); \
if (fabs((value)) < (weightnearzero)) \
ERROR_PRINT("# WARNING!!! Detected weightnearzero\n"); \
} while(false);

Referenced by ANN::BiasConnections::randomizeWeights(), ANN::AllAllConnections::randomizeWeights(), ANN::BiasConnections::randomizeWeightsAtColumn(), and ANN::AllAllConnections::randomizeWeightsAtColumn().
